summary: PMCC page bug fixes verified successfully. All 4 reported issues are resolved: 1) Pre-computed PMCC scans load and display data correctly, 2) No duplicate symbols in default screener results, 3) Layout reorganized correctly (Header -> Strategy Explanation -> Quick Scans -> Filters + Results), 4) Strategy Notes are compact. Data mapping from backend long_* fields to frontend leaps_* fields working correctly via normalizeOpp() helper.
critical_code_review_comments: normalizeOpp() helper function correctly maps backend long_* fields to frontend leaps_* fields
Deduplication logic in fetchOpportunities() working - keeps highest score per symbol
SortHeader component moved outside main component to fix React lint error
Layout reorganized: Header -> compact Strategy Explanation -> Quick Scans -> grid with Filters + Results
Pre-computed scan indicator shows scan name, result count, and update date
seed_data_creation: None - used existing pre-computed scan data
context_for_next_testing_agent: PMCC page fully functional. Pre-computed scans (Conservative/Balanced/Aggressive) load correctly via /api/scans/pmcc/{risk_profile}. Default screener uses /api/screener/pmcc. Simulate button opens modal with normalized data from both custom and pre-computed scans. All table columns display correctly with proper data mapping.

pmcc_page_layout.details: Layout reorganized correctly: Header at top, compact Strategy Explanation, Quick Scans section, then grid with Filters panel and Results table

conservative.sample_data: COP: LEAPS 17DEC26 83 C, Cost $2,002, Short 12FEB26 103 C, Premium $203

data_mapping.details: Backend long_* fields (long_dte, long_strike, long_premium) correctly mapped to frontend leaps_* display via normalizeOpp() helper

duplicate_symbols.details: Default screener results show 20 unique symbols with no duplicates

simulate_button.details: Modal opens with correct data: Symbol, Strategy (PMCC), Stock Price, LEAPS (Buy) Strike/Cost, Short Call (Sell) Strike/Premium, Net Debit, Number of Contracts

custom_scan_button.details: Clears pre-computed scan indicator and loads default screener results

table_columns_verified: LEAPS (Buy) - shows contract format like '17DEC26 83 C' with delta
Short (Sell) - shows contract format with delta

mocked_apis.note: No mocked APIs - all data from real pre-computed scans stored in MongoDB
